name: Hot Fire - Group 4
description:
- 2 PLAYER ONLY -

Be the one to knock out your friend via punching, blocking and less damaging longer range attacks.

Controls

Player1: W - Jump, A - Move Left, S - Move Right, D - Block, T - Punch, Y - Spell

Player2: I - Jump, J - Move Left, L - Move Right, K - Block, N - Punch, M - Spell

UP886560 (Lauren Ansdell-Miller)
UP904461 (Phillip Baker)
UP904392 (Connor Wright)
UP898620 (Zack Beach)
UP897934 (Scott Raimbach)

Made in Unity

Music: Fantasy Battle Music Free Pack

Other assets: Free Platform Game Assets 

Mage Shield: https://www.kisspng.com/free/opengameartorg.html - 

Background: http://wallur.com/wallpaper/28611

Main menu background: ttps://www.deviantart.com/lockeliefather/art/Background-Fire-theme-493073909

& Royalty free sound effects.

Made with the help of many of Brackeys tutorials in Unity.
